subdisciplines.name: Language Acquisition
subdisciplines.description: The study of how humans acquire and learn language, including the social, psychological, and cognitive factors that influence language development.

subdisciplines.name: Language Assessment
subdisciplines.description: The development and use of tests to measure language proficiency, including the design and evaluation of language tests for various purposes and contexts.

subdisciplines.name: Language Education
subdisciplines.description: The study of how to teach languages effectively, including language pedagogy, curriculum development, and teacher training.

subdisciplines.name: Sociolinguistics
subdisciplines.description: The study of the relationship between language and society, including language variation, language attitudes, and language use in different social contexts.
